ExternalEventMapping.name: ExternalEventMapping
ExternalEventMapping.description: Holds native iOS or Android calendar event details for the Salesforce Today feature in the Salesforce mobile app.

EndDate.description: The date the external event ends.

EventId.description: The ID of the Salesforce event created by the external event.

ExternalId.description: The ID of the external event.

IsLocked.description: Returns true if the external event is locked, or false if it’s not.

IsRecurring.description: Indicates whether the external event is recurring (true) or not (fales).

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the external event can be edited (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The name of the external event’s organizer.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the creator of the external event.

StartDate.description: The date the external event begins.
